name: S&E-related degrees awarded, by degree level and field: 2012 and 2021
description: S&E-related degrees awarded, by degree level and field: 2012 and 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Data are based on institutions eligible to participate in Title IV federal financial aid programs. Certificates include only awards of less than 2 academic years below the associate's degree level. Doctoral degree programs include research doctoral degree programs only and do not include professional doctoral programs (e.g., Doctor of Medicine).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, special tabulations (2022) of the National Center for Education Statistics, Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS), Completions Survey, provisional release data. Science and Engineering Indicators
